description: Comprehensive API integration review for White Cross Healthcare Platform - analyze endpoints, client usage, response handling, server actions, and backend alignment

workstreams.description: Map all API endpoints and identify usage gaps
workstreams.findings: Discovered duplicate endpoint definitions in api-client.ts and constants/api.ts

workstreams.description: Review API client usage patterns and consistency
workstreams.findings: Found inconsistent imports, missing server actions for most entities

workstreams.description: Analyze response structure handling across pages
workstreams.findings: Pages handle multiple response formats, backend migration incomplete

workstreams.description: Check server actions for Next.js 15 compatibility and consistency
workstreams.findings: Only students/actions.ts exists, properly uses Next.js 15 async APIs

workstreams.description: Validate API endpoints match backend routes
workstreams.findings: Backend uses direct routes, frontend expects /api/v1 prefix in some cases

decisions.decision: Identified critical issue: Duplicate API endpoint definitions causing inconsistency
Response format inconsistency requires backend standardization
decisions.recommendation: Backend should always return {data, meta} format

decisions.decision: Server actions missing for most entities
decisions.recommendation: Create server actions following students/actions.ts pattern
